code: /**  * Creates and configures a [[SerializationSchema]] using the given properties.  *  * @param properties normalized properties describing the format  * @return the configured serialization schema or null if the factory cannot provide an  *         instance of this class  */ SerializationSchema<T> createSerializationSchema(Map<String, String> properties).
